      • showMessage

        public void showMessage(java.lang.String msg,
               java.lang.String msgClass)
        Will display the given message in the messages div.
        Parameters:
        msg - The string that we wish to display
        msgClass - The class that will be applied in the message div. "sad" for error messages, "happy" for successful messages
